snippet: Antonia Caba moved to New York from the Dominican Republic in 2007. She struggled to pay her bills and worked a night shift that left her precious little time to spend with her four children.
abstract: Children’s Aid Society, one of the organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Antonia Caba of the Bronx pay for furniture and clothing for her children.
lead_paragraph: Antonia Caba moved to New York from the Dominican Republic in 2007. She struggled to pay her bills and worked a night shift that left her precious little time to spend with her four children.

headline.main: In New Country, Mother Sacrifices Precious Family Time to Pay Bills
headline.print_headline: In New Country, Mother Sacrifices Precious Family Time to Pay Bills
